general.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
general.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
general.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
general.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
general.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
general.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
general.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
general.maintenance: System is under maintenance. Please try again later.
general.rateLimit: Too many requests. Please try again later.

auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
auth.accountLocked: Account temporarily locked due to security reasons.

cart.itemAlreadyInCart: This item is already in your cart.

checkout.addressMismatch: Billing address does not match card.

files.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {size}.
